title: Android 10 (Q) Beta 4. The phone just won't turn on. Google Pixel XL
content: Phone Google Pixel, Android 10 (Q) Beta 4. Yesterday suddenly the phone started to reboot and so all night long, until it was discharged. After charging, this cyclic reset is repeated again. The phone just won't turn on. In rekaveri mod go also does not work-goes on an endless reboot. Computer phone not sees. What am I to do?! I can't use my phone!!
